In the heart of Greece, at the foot of the mythical mount Olympus, in the picturesque Platamon, one of the most interesting and beautiful areas of Pieria, Sun Beach Hotel Platamonas is the best choice for you. It is a location of remarkable natural beauty, ideal if your wish is to enjoy your holiday combining mountain and sea.
